text: Iron Man was a 1994 American animated series based on the Marvel Comics hero Iron Man. It was created by Stan Lee. It stars Robert Hays, James Avery, John Reilly, and Jim Cummings. It ran from September 1994 to February 1996. Category:1994 American television series debuts Category:1996 American television series endings Category:1990s American animated television series
title: Iron Man (1994 TV series)
